title: Is THIS the CDC’s ‘Data’? | Guests: Larry Elder & John Ziegler | 7/29/21
description:
Glenn discusses the new mask mandates happening around the country and the concerning study the CDC allegedly got its data from. Rep. Chip Roy gave a fiery speech condemning the new House mask mandate as the border crisis continues. Columnist John Ziegler joins to discuss information on the rising COVID cases that the media won’t cover. Radio host Larry Elder calls in to discuss his gubernatorial run in California and what he would do to fix the state. Glenn digs into the Biden administration’s concerning new definition of “domestic terrorism.” Are the Capitol Police trying to become an intelligence agency? Ben and Jerry’s is feeling the heat in New York after Jewish people have stopped buying its ice cream.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
